name: part_000
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening intro trailer for Tsunomaki Watame's 4th Anniversary LIVE 'Amazing Swing', featuring a retrospective of her history and the reveal of her new outfit.
Performance of the song 'What an amazing swing' by Tsunomaki Watame in a glamorous Las Vegas-themed stage called 'Lamb Vegas'.
